text: Intransitive can mean: * the opposite of transitive, see Transitivity (disambiguation) * Intransitivity, a mathematical property of binary relations * Intransitive verb, a verb that does not allow an object * Intransitive case, the grammatical case for arguments of intransitive verbs * Intransitive Recordings, an independent American record label == See also == * Nontransitive game * Nontransitive dice
title: Intransitive (disambiguation)
